name: Kid Soldier PC A 4 Prototype Game Demo
name_original: Kid Soldier PC A 4 Prototype Game Demo
description:
Rehancing version of the 4th Kid Soldier installment 

Developed with #Clickteamfusion2 engine. #Pixelartist must be need Gameplay of all Characters for the demo. it's a free game.  

with all of your fav characters from heathcliff and the catillac cats & Melee mechanincs special moves & devastating gameplay. The Explosive Crossover Action game Game Series returns in the 4th installment.
